# UITextStorageDirection

**Enumeration**

The direction of text storage.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UITextStorageDirection
```

## Overview

Constants of this type are used as arguments to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/baseWritingDirection(for:in:)] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/textStyling(at:in:)] methods.

## Constants

- **UITextStorageDirection.forward**: Storage of the text in a forward direction.
- **UITextStorageDirection.backward**: Storage of the text in a backward direction.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **UITextDirection**: The direction of the text.
- **UITextLayoutDirection**: The direction of text layout.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
